cobyqa.tests.assert_array_less_equal¶

tests.assert_array_less_equal(x, y, err_msg='', verbose=True)[source]¶

Raise an AssertionError if two objects are not less-or-equal-ordered.

Parameters
xarray_like

Smaller object to check.

yarray_like

Larger object to compare.

err_msgstr, optional

Error message to be printed in case of failure.

verbosebool, optional

Whether the conflicting values are appended to the error message (default is True).

Raises
AssertionError

The two arrays are not less-or-equal-ordered.

previous

Test support (cobyqa.tests)

next

cobyqa.tests.assert_dtype_equal
